title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 85-2.6 - Consultation with staff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 85-2.6 - Consultation with staff

State Regulations

Applicants, other parties, and all interested groups and
persons are invited and encouraged to confer on an informal basis with the
staff of the commission with respect to any matter related to a filing or
proposed filing. Except as expressly provided to the contrary, neither an
applicant, other party, interested group or person, nor the commission staff, shall be bound by any statement made during the course of such informal
consultation. The commission shall not be bound without its
consent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
85-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
